summary: Amaterasu is the Japanese sun goddess and one of the most important deities in Shinto. She is often seen as the leader of the Shinto gods. In ancient Japanese texts, she is described as the ruler of heaven and the ancestor of the Japanese royal family. Amaterasu is one of three important children of the creator god Izanagi. Her main shrine, the Grand Shrine of Ise, is a significant pilgrimage site in Japan. Many other shrines across the country also honor her.
title: Amaterasu
